tool_description: The CRUD Operation is a powerful tool designed for developers to perform CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on JSON data without any schema restrictions. It offers a simple yet powerful interface for managing JSON documents of varying structures, enabling seamless data manipulation within applications.
name: CRUD Operations
title: CRUD Operations

api_list.name: Get by ID
api_list.description: Get a item by it's ID

api_list.name: healthCheck
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crud-operations2.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/healthcheck"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crud-operations2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
